products.name: Modern Wooden Chair
products.description: A stylish and ergonomic wooden chair made from sustainable oak with a comfortable curved backrest and smooth finish. Perfect for dining rooms or home offices.

products.name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
products.description: This sleek desk lamp features an adjustable arm, warm LED light and touch-sensitive controls. Ideal for late-night study or office work.

products.name: Compact Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: A portable speaker with high-fidelity sound, long battery life and waterproof design. Connect via Bluetooth to play your favorite tunes anywhere.

products.name: Eco-Friendly Notebook
products.description: A 120-page notebook made from recycled paper. Features a sturdy cover and dotted grid pages for sketches, notes or journaling.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Keep your drinks cold or hot for hours with this insulated stainless steel bottle. Comes with a leak-proof cap and a carry handle.

products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: Experience immersive sound with these comfortable over-ear headphones. Features noise-canceling technology and 20-hour battery life.

products.name: Bamboo Cutting Board
products.description: A durable cutting board made from 100% bamboo. Naturally antimicrobial and gentle on your knives. Perfect for chopping vegetables or meat.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Soft and breathable t-shirt made from organic cotton. A classic crew neck design available in multiple colors.

products.name: Ceramic Planter Set
products.description: A set of three handcrafted ceramic planters with drainage holes. Ideal for succulents, herbs or small plants. Comes in three complementary colors.

products.name: Portable Laptop Stand
products.description: An adjustable aluminum laptop stand that elevates your laptop for better ergonomics. Lightweight, foldable and fits most laptop sizes.
